## DelegatesARIACombobox class

Includes ARIA states and properties relating to the ARIA combobox role.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class DelegatesARIACombobox 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |

|  [ariaAutoComplete](./fast-foundation.delegatesariacombobox.ariaautocomplete.md) |  | "inline" \| "list" \| "both" \| "none" \| string \| null | See [https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.2/\#aria-autocomplete](https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.2/#aria-autocomplete) for more information. |
